description.value: The SOAP Monitor verifies availability, content, and access time for specified SOAP requests to ensure the availability of SOAP Services. It supports secure communication and HTTP proxies.

property.label: URL
property.description: This property is deprecated and thus hidden. Old description: The full URL to connect to in the format protocol://host:port/path Protocol has to be http or https, the port can be omitted for the respective default port.

property.label: Protocol
property.description: Select the protocol that will be used to establish the connection. If 'https' is selected, a secure connection will be made using SSL.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default HTTP port is 80.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default port for HTTP over SSL is 443.

property.label: Path
property.description: Enter the path to the webpage to be monitored. Example: /index.html

property.label: Content Type
property.description: Content Type of SOAP call SOAP 1.1="text/xml" SOAP 1.2="application/soap+xml"

property.label: Character Set
property.description: UTF character setting

property.label: Enable SOAPAction Header
property.description: Enable to send a SOAPAction HTTP header with your request. Useful if your application is returning 500 errors for valid requests.

property.label: SOAP Action Header
property.description: SOAP Action Header

property.label: SOAP Envelope POST Data
property.description: The SOAP Envelope data which will be sent with the POST request.

property.label: SOAP Envelope Substitution Mode
HTTP version
property.description: The version of the HTTP protocol. HTTP/1.1 is the recommended.

property.label: User-Agent
property.description: The user agent string identifies the HTTP client and is sent with every request.

property.label: Max. redirects
property.description: If a value of 1 or greater is specified, the SOAP Monitor will follow HTTP redirect codes (301-303, 307) to retrieve the webpage.

property.label: Match content
property.description: If enabled, the specified string will be searched in the retrieved page.

property.label: Search string
property.description: Enter a case-sensitive string to search for in the retrieved webpage. If 'Success if match' is configured and the webpage contains the string, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.

property.label: Bytes
property.description: Enter the number of bytes expected for the response.

property.label: Server authorization
property.description: If the SOAP specified requires a name and password for access, server authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Server username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the server.

property.label: Server password
property.description: The password for the username.

property.label: Proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used to access the SOAP.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy authorization
property.description: If the HTTP proxy server requires a username and a password for access, proxy authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

property.label: Structured URL
property.description: This property is deprecated and thus hidden. Old description: Decide between string based URL configuration to paste an URL from the address bar of a browser, and structurized URL configuration to specify host, path etc. separately.

property.label: dynaTrace Tagging
property.description: Enable dynaTrace tagging.

property.label: timer name
property.description: Identify this webrequest through a unique timer name. The timer name will be sent with each web request as a dynaTrace header field value.

property.label: Disable certificate validation
property.description: Enable to allow connections via SSL even if the certificate on the target host is invalid or self-signed.

metric.name: HostReachable
metric.description: If the host is reachable, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.

metric.name: HeaderSize
metric.description: The size of the response header in bytes.

metric.name: FirstResponseDelay
metric.description: The elapsed time in milliseconds from requesting the SOAP content until the first byte of the content has arrived.

metric.name: ResponseCompleteTime
metric.description: The elapsed time in milliseconds from requesting the SOAP content until the whole content has arrived.

metric.name: ResponseSize
metric.description: The size of the SOAP content in bytes.

metric.name: Throughput
metric.description: The average achieved throughput (kilobytes/sec) during SOAP content retrieval.

metric.name: HttpStatusCode
metric.description: The HTTP status code from the server response.

metric.name: ConnectionCloseDelay
metric.description: The elapsed time in milliseconds until the connection to the server has been closed.

metric.name: ContentVerified
metric.description: If the content could be verified, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.

description.value: Provides metrics to query performance data of a specific SOAP request.
